channel.title: NPC to say im online or offline
channel.description: Well, I used to know how to but I can't remember what the command is to put it in client.java please help!

item.title: NPC to say im online or offline
item.dc:creator: @Scott1337 Scott1337
item.description:
@Scott1337 wrote:

In NpcHandler.java, search moo and then look for some Npc’s talking and under the last } add this

[code]npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Your player name here.”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “The One and only, your name here”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Your player name here is asleep but still watching you!”;

}
[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: NPC to say im online or offline
